scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Calendar_EventWidget_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($links = $core_v2_page.ParseQueryString($core_v2_widget.GetCustomValue('links','Link=eventSubscribe&Link=eventEdit&Link=viewRegistrations&Link=cancelEvent&Link=deleteEvent&Link=download&Link=rss'))) #set($currentCalendar = $calendar_v1_calendars.Current) #set($userId = $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id) #set($userTimeZoneId = $core_v2_user.Accessing.TimeZoneId) #set($userTimeZone = false) #if ($core_v2_user.Accessing.TimeZoneInfo) #set($userTimeZone = $core_v2_user.Accessing.TimeZoneInfo) #end #set($event = false) #set($event = $calendar_v1_events.Current) #if (!$event) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set ($hasModifyEventPermission = $calendar_v1_events.HasPermission($event.Id,$calendar_v1_permissions.EditEvent)) #set($currentDate = $calendar_v1_UI.AdjustForUserTime($core_v2_utility.CurrentDate)) #set($startDate = $event.EventStartDate) #set($endDate = $event.EventEndDate) #if ($core_v2_user.Accessing.DateFormat) #set($eventDateTimeFormatString = "$core_v2_user.Accessing.DateFormat $core_v2_configuration.TimeFormat") #else #set($eventDateTimeFormatString = "yyyy-M-d $core_v2_configuration.TimeFormat") #end #if($startDate.Date == $endDate.Date) #set($eventEndTimeFormatString = $core_v2_configuration.TimeFormat) #else #set($eventEndTimeFormatString = $eventDateTimeFormatString) #end #if($currentDate > $endDate)
$core_v2_language.GetResource('calendar_event_past')
#end #if($currentDate >= $startDate && $currentDate <= $endDate)
$core_v2_language.GetResource('calendar_event_insession')
#end #if($event.IsCancelled)
$core_v2_language.GetResource('calendar_event_cancelled')
#end #if($event.RegistrationType != "NotSet" && $event.RegistrationType != "InvitationOnly") #if(($event.TotalRegistrations >= $event.MaximumRegistrationsAllowed) && $event.MaximumRegistrationsAllowed > 0)
$core_v2_language.GetResource('calendar_registration_nospace')
#end #end
#set($registration = false) #set($registration = $calendar_v1_registrations.Current) #if (!$registration) #set($registration = $calendar_v1_registrations.Get($event.Id, $userId)) #end #set($userIsRegistered = $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($userId)) #set($showRegistrationButton = true) #if ($event.IsCancelled || $event.EventEndDate <= $core_v2_utility.CurrentDate) #set($showRegistrationButton = false) #end #if($event.RegistrationType == 'NotSet' || (!$event.AllowAnonymousRegistrations && !$userIsRegistered) || ($event.RegistrationType == 'InvitationOnly' && !$registration)) #set($showRegistrationButton = false) #end #if(($event.TotalRegistrations >= $event.MaximumRegistrationsAllowed) && $event.MaximumRegistrationsAllowed > 0) #set($showRegistrationButton = false) #end #if ($showRegistrationButton)
#if ($registration && $registration.Status == 'Confirmed') $core_v2_language.GetResource('ModifyRegistration') #else $core_v2_language.GetResource('Register') #end
#end

$event.EventTitle

#if($event.EventLocation.length > 0) #set($imgUrl = false) #set($mapUrl = false) #if ($geocoding_v1_core.IsEnabled) #set ($latitude = $event.Latitude) #set ($longitude = $event.Longitude) #if ($latitude > -90 && $longitude > -180) #set ($imgUrl = $geocoding_v1_core.GetMapUrl($latitude, $longitude)) #set ($mapUrl = $geocoding_v1_core.GetServiceRedirectUrl($event.AddressString)) #end #end #end #if ($mapUrl && $imgUrl)
#end

$core_v2_language.GetResource('label_when')

$core_v2_language.FormatDate($startDate, "%{Format = $eventDateTimeFormatString, TimeZoneId = $event.TimeZone.Id}") $core_v2_language.GetResource("to") $core_v2_language.FormatDate($endDate, "%{Format = $eventEndTimeFormatString, TimeZoneId = $event.TimeZone.Id}") $!core_v2_configuration.GetTimeZone($event.TimeZone.Id, $startDate).NameWithoutOffset
#if ($userIsRegistered && $userTimeZoneId != $event.TimeZone.Id && $userTimeZone)
$core_v2_language.FormatDate($startDate, "%{Format = $eventDateTimeFormatString}") $core_v2_language.GetResource("to") $core_v2_language.FormatDate($endDate, "%{Format = $eventEndTimeFormatString}") $!core_v2_configuration.GetTimeZone($userTimeZone.Id, $startDate).NameWithoutOffset
#end #if($event.EventLocation.length > 0)

$core_v2_language.GetResource('label_where')

#if ($mapUrl) $event.EventLocation #else $event.EventLocation #end
#end
#if ($event.IsExternal)
$core_v2_encoding.HtmlAttributeEncode($event.EventReferenceUrl)
#end
$event.EventDescription
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile("subview-tags.vm")
#foreach($link in $links.Values('Link')) #beforeall
    #set($likeFormat = "{count}") #if ($core_v2_like.CanLike($event.ContentId, $event.ContentTypeId)) #set($likeFormat = "{toggle} {count}") #end
  • $core_v2_ui.Like($event.ContentId, $event.ContentTypeId, "%{ Format = $likeFormat, IncludeTip = 'true' }")
  • #set ($readOnly = true) #if ($userIsRegistered) #set ($readOnly = false) #end $core_v2_ui.Rate($event.ContentId, $calendar_v1_events.ContentTypeId, "%{ ReadOnly = $readOnly }")
    • #each #if($link == 'eventEdit' && $calendar_v1_calendars.HasPermission($event.CalendarId,$calendar_v1_permissions.EditEvent)) #set($url = $calendar_v1_urls.EditEvent($event.Id)) #if ($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('edit')
    • #end #end #if ($link == 'convert') #set($convert = false) #set($convert = $core_v2_ui.ConvertContent($event.ContentId, $event.ContentTypeId)) #if ($convert)
  • $convert
    • #end #end #if($link == 'viewRegistrations' && $calendar_v1_calendars.HasPermission($event.CalendarId,$calendar_v1_permissions.ViewRegistrations)) #set($url = $calendar_v1_urls.RegisteredUsers($event.Id)) #if ($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('calendar_EventLinks_ViewRegistrations')
    • #end #end #if ($link == 'eventSubscribe' && $userIsRegistered && $calendar_v1_calendars.HasPermission($event.CalendarId,$calendar_v1_permissions.ViewCalendar))
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('event_Subscribe_Off')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('event_Subscribe_On')
    • #registerEndOfPageHtml("widget.${core_v2_widget.WrapperElementId}.eventSubscribe") #end #end #if($link == 'cancelEvent' && $calendar_v1_calendars.HasPermission($currentCalendar.Id,$calendar_v1_permissions.EditEvent) && $event.IsCancelled == false)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('calendar_EventLinks_CancelEvent')
    • #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #set($hasLinks = true) #end #set($perm = false) #set($perm = $core_v2_permission.Get($calendar_v1_permissions.DeleteEvent,$userId,$event.ContentId,$calendar_v1_events.ContentTypeId)) #if ($link == 'deleteEvent' && $perm && $perm.IsAllowed)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('delete')
    • #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #end #if($link == 'rss' && $calendar_v1_calendars.HasPermission($currentCalendar.Id,$calendar_v1_permissions.ViewCalendar)) #set($url = $calendar_v1_urls.EventCommentRSS($event.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('calendar_EventLinks_Rss')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #if($link == 'download' && $calendar_v1_calendars.HasPermission($currentCalendar.Id,$calendar_v1_permissions.ViewCalendar)) #set($url = $calendar_v1_urls.DownloadEvent($event.Id)) #if($url)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('calendar_EventLinks_Download')
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #end #if ($link == 'feature' && $core_v3_feature.CanFeature($event.ContentId, $event.ContentTypeId))
  • $core_v2_ui.Feature($event.ContentId, $event.ContentTypeId)
    • #end #if ($event && $link == 'abuse' && $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id))
  • $core_v2_ui.Moderate($event.ContentId, $calendar_v1_events.ContentTypeId, "%{ }")
    • #set($hasLinks = true) #end #if($hasLinks)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('more')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('cancel')
    • #end #afterall
#end
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.calendarEvent') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Calendar_EventWidget_Title}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="mapZoom" resourceName="CalendarMap_MapZoom" dataType="int" defaultValue="15"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="9999" /> </property> <property id="mapHeight" resourceName="CalendarMap_MapHeight" dataType="int" defaultValue="300"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="9999" /> </property> <property id="mapWidth" resourceName="CalendarMap_MapWidth" dataType="int" defaultValue="920"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="9999" /> </property> <property id="links" resourceName="event_Links" dataType="custom" defaultValue="Link=eventSubscribe&Link=feature&Link=eventEdit&Link=viewRegistrations&Link=cancelEvent&Link=deleteEvent&Link=convert&Link=download&Link=rss&Link=abuse" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.SortableListControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" height="300" key="Link" > <propertyValue value="eventSubscribe" resourceName="calendar_EventLinks_Subscribe" /> <propertyValue value="eventEdit" resourceName="calendar_EventLinks_EditLink" /> <propertyValue value="viewRegistrations" resourceName="calendar_EventLinks_ViewRegistrationsLink" /> <propertyValue value="cancelEvent" resourceName="calendar_EventLinks_CancelEventLink" /> <propertyValue value="deleteEvent" resourceName="calendar_EventLinks_DeleteEventLink" /> <propertyValue value="convert" resourceName="Convert" /> <propertyValue value="download" resourceName="calendar_EventLinks_DownloadLink" /> <propertyValue value="rss" resourceName="calendar_EventLinks_RssLink" /> <propertyValue value="feature" resourceName="CF_Feature" /> <propertyValue value="abuse" resourceName="calendar_EventLinks_AbuseLink" /> </property> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Are you sure you wish to cancel this event? This cannot be undone.
An error occurred while canceling the event.
Are you sure you wish to delete this event? This will cause the event to first be cancelled along with any/all registrations. This cannot be undone.
An error occurred while deleting the event.
This event occurred in the past.
Displays details of a single calendar event
Failed to load preview for redirect url.
This event is currently full or registration has been closed
Email Address Length should not exceed 256 characters
First Name should not exceed 128 characters
Last Name should not exceed 128 characters
You are currently attending this event.
You have been invited to attend this event.
Your registration request has been received. You will receive further information soon.
An error occurred cancelling Event Registration, it may have already been cancelled.
An error occurred creating Event Registration
An error occurred updating Event Registration
A Registration error occurred, your invitation may have expired.
